description: This file defines the enyo framework's path resolver and loader factory, including methods for managing script, stylesheet, and package dependencies, as well as package path decoding and aliasing.

classes.name: enyo.pathResolverFactory
classes.description: Factory for resolving and rewriting paths with macros.

classes.name: enyo.loaderFactory
classes.description: Loader class for managing dependencies, packages, scripts, stylesheets, and package path decoding.

methods.name: addPath
methods.description: Adds a path alias to the resolver.

methods.name: addPaths
methods.description: Adds multiple paths to the resolver.

methods.name: includeTrailingSlash
methods.description: Ensures a path ends with a slash.

methods.name: rewrite
methods.description: Replaces macros in paths with their mapped values.

methods.name: loadScript
methods.description: Loads a script via the machine.

methods.name: more
methods.description: Processes a dependency block, handling asynchronous loading.

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Completes package loading and triggers finish callbacks.

methods.name: continueBlock
methods.description: Continues processing dependencies in a block.

methods.name: require
methods.description: Processes a dependency path, determining if it's a script, stylesheet, design, or package.

methods.name: getPathPrefix
methods.description: Determines the prefix for a given path.

methods.name: requireScript
methods.description: Handles script dependencies and manages loading callbacks.

methods.name: decodePackagePath
methods.description: Decodes package paths into alias, target, folder, and manifest.

methods.name: aliasPackage
methods.description: Creates an alias for a package based on its path.

methods.name: requirePackage
methods.description: Handles package dependencies and path aliasing.
